author: Griffin Connolly, Griffin Connolly
title: Georgia Republican Senator Kelly Loeffler sold off even more stock after coronavirus briefing than previously reported
description: Freshman GOP senator shed $18.7m in stock in trading company where her husband is CEO after publicly assuring Americans economy was 'strong' and job numbers were 'growing'
content:
Georgia Republican Sen. Kelly Loeffler traded millions more dollars in stocks than previously reported after attending a non-public 24 January briefing on the coronavirus whose spread into a pandemic has sunk global markets.
More than $18.7m in stock in Inte… [+6503 chars]
